TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ComClassAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ComClassAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ComClassAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 特性指示编译器添加使类可以作为 COM 对象公开的元数据。

span.span: The attribute instructs the compiler to add metadata that allows a class to be exposed as a COM object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`ComClassAttribute`以简化公开从 Visual Basic 的 COM 组件的过程。Use `ComClassAttribute` to simplify the process of exposing COM components from Visual Basic. COM 对象有很大不同从.NET Framework 程序集;而无需`ComClassAttribute`，你需要遵循的步骤以从 Visual Basic 生成 COM 对象数。COM objects are very different from .NET Framework assemblies; without the `ComClassAttribute`, you need to follow a number of steps to generate a COM object from Visual Basic. 为类标记为`ComClassAttribute`，编译器自动执行的许多这些步骤。For classes marked with `ComClassAttribute`, the compiler performs many of these steps automatically. > [!NOTE] > 此属性可以简化 COM 对象的创建。This attribute simplifies the creation of COM objects. 若要公开为 COM 对象的类，你必须将项目编译与**为 COM 互操作注册**中选择选项**生成**部分**配置属性**对话框。To expose a class as a COM object, you must compile the project with the **Register for COM Interop** option selected in the **Build** section of the **Configuration Properties** dialog box. > [!NOTE] > 尽管你可以公开 Visual basic 创建作为 COM 对象以供使用的非托管代码的类，但它不是真正的 COM 对象。Although you can also expose a class created with Visual Basic as a COM object for unmanaged code to use, it is not a true COM object. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 应用程序的 COM 互操作性](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/com-interop/com-interoperability-in-net-framework-applications.md)。For details, see [COM Interoperability in .NET Framework Applications](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/com-interop/com-interoperability-in-net-framework-applications.md). ## Examples 若要运行此示例中，创建一个新**类库**应用程序并将下面的代码添加到类模块。To run this example, create a new **Class Library** application and add the following code to a class module. [!code-vb[VbCnAttributes#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbCnAttributes/VB/Class2.vb#21)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数来`ComClassAttribute`类来设置`ClassID`， `InterfaceID`，或`EventID`属性时应用`ComClassAttribute`类。Use the constructor for the `ComClassAttribute` class to set the `ClassID`, `InterfaceID`, or `EventID` properties when applying the `ComClassAttribute` to a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数来`ComClassAttribute`类来设置`ClassID`， `InterfaceID`，或`EventID`属性时应用`ComClassAttribute`类。Use the constructor for the `ComClassAttribute` class to set the `ClassID`, `InterfaceID`, or `EventID` properties when applying the `ComClassAttribute` to a class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClassID As String
public: property System::String ^ ClassID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个用于唯一标识类的类 ID。

span.span: Gets a class ID used to uniquely identify a class.
Read-only.

value.span: 一个字符串，它可由编译器使用以唯一标识在创建 COM 对象时的类。

span.span: A string that can be used by the compiler to uniquely identify the class when a COM object is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数将设置此属性时`ComClassAttribute`应用于类。The constructor sets this property when the `ComClassAttribute` is applied to a class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EventID As String
public: property System::String ^ EventID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个用于唯一标识事件的事件 ID。

span.span: Gets an event ID used to uniquely identify an event.
Read only.

value.span: 一个字符串，它可由编译器使用以唯一标识在创建 COM 对象时的类的事件。

span.span: A string that can be used by the compiler to uniquely identify an event for the class when a COM object is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数将设置此属性时`ComClassAttribute`应用于类。The constructor sets this property when the `ComClassAttribute` is applied to a class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InterfaceID As String
public: property System::String ^ InterfaceID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个用于唯一标识接口的接口 ID。

span.span: Gets an interface ID used to uniquely identify an interface.
Read-only.

value.span: 一个字符串，它可由编译器使用以唯一标识在创建 COM 对象时的类的接口。

span.span: A string that can be used by the compiler to uniquely identify an interface for the class when a COM object is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数将设置此属性时`ComClassAttribute`应用于类。The constructor sets this property when the `ComClassAttribute` is applied to a class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool InterfaceShadows { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 指示 COM 接口名称是否隐藏类或基类的另一个成员。

span.span: Indicates that the COM interface name shadows another member of the class or base class.

value.span: 一个 值，它指示 COM 接口名称会隐藏类或基类的另一个成员。

span.span: A value that indicates that the COM interface name shadows another member of the class or base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成员与另一个成员使用相同的名称时隐藏。Shadowing is when a member uses the same name as another member.
